exceptions.exn: In environment u : nat -> R H : ex_lim_seq u Unable to unify "exists l : Rbar, is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (?M2369 n)) l" with "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally (Rbar_div_pos (Rbar_plus (LimSup_seq u) (LimInf_seq u)) {| pos := 2; cond_pos := Rlt_R0_R2 |}) P -> filtermap u eventually P".
The reference l was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hu was not found in the current environment.

original: intros u H. unfold ex_lim_seq, Lim_seq. intros [l Hu]. apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply is_lim_seq_abs. apply ex_lim_seq_abs. exists l. apply Hu.
